name: Full Body Maternity Pillow – Bean-Filled Pregnancy Support Pillow with Removable Cover – 59″ Long Full-Length Back, Hip & Belly Support for Pregnancy & Nursing, Silver
short_description: 85% Cotton / 15% Spandex Blend
🤰 FULL BODY SUPPORT + SHAPE-MOLDING – Inner core measures 59″ × 7.87″ of micro bean fill, delivering contouring support for back, hips, legs & belly during each trimester 🛌🌼🩷
🌿 BREATHABLE STRETCH COVER – Outer shell made of 85% cotton / 15% spandex blend provides airflow and gentle stretch over the bean core for comfort and flexibility 🧵🍃🌬️
🧼 REMOVABLE & MACHINE-WASHABLE – Zippered cover easily comes off for laundering; durability built for repeated cleaning through pregnancy and postpartum use 💦🔄👖
🍼 MULTI-ROLE USE FOR MAMA & BABY – Beyond pregnancy, use as nursing support, leg rest, or lounge aide. Versatile pillow follows your maternity journey through postpartum comfort ✨👶💕
💪 DURABLE INNER LINER & SECURE FILL – Inner liner of 100% polyester holds EPS micro beans in place and prevents leakage, giving lasting shape and comfort support 👌🧷📏
product_description: Introducing your all-in-one support companion: the Full Body Maternity Bean Pillow with a 59″ × 7.87″ adaptive core to cradle you from neck to toe. This pillow features a **59″ × 7.87″ micro bean core** that delivers responsive contouring comfort to your back, hips, legs, and pregnant belly. The outer cover spans **90″ × 16″**, providing full coverage and gentle wrap-around support. Fabric & Construction: - Outer Cover: 85% cotton / 15% spandex blend that breathes and stretches to conform to your body. - Inner Liner: 100% polyester, durable and secure to keep EPS bean filling contained. - Filling: EPS micro beans shift and mold, giving you gentle, non-lumpy support. - Zippered removable cover for easy washing and long-term hygiene. Support & Utility: This full body design helps maintain neutral spinal alignment, easing pressure on hips and lower back. Many users position it between knees or along the back for relief, or fold / reconfigure for nursing arms or leg elevation postpartum. Ideal For: Pregnant women needing full body support across trimesters Nursing mothers seeking arm or torso support while feeding Postpartum rest, leg elevation, or recovery lounging Lounging in bed, reading, watching TV, or side-sleeping comfort Baby showers, registry picks, or gifts for expecting moms Care Instructions: Remove the outer cover via zipper. Machine wash the cover in cold water on gentle cycle. Tumble dry low or air dry. Do not bleach. The inner bean core stays inside the liner. The stretchy cover holds shape even after many wash/dry cycles. Why Choose This Maternity Pillow? A precise 59″ × 7.87″ bean core gives contoured support without bulk Stretch cotton cover keeps you cooler and adapts to body changes Removable, washable cover makes upkeep easy Inner liner is robust and secure to keep beans in place Multi-use for nursing, lounging, postpartum recovery Step into comfort tailored for pregnancy and beyond. This Full Body Maternity Bean Pillow is built to support your changing body, cradle your needs during nursing, and remain a go-to support piece long after baby arrives.
